data.title: Map & Driving Directions
data.text:
Address:

WKSU-FM

1613 East Summit Street

Kent, Ohio 44242

View Larger Map

Local Driving Directions (within Kent)

Turn onto Summit Street in Kent from either State Routes 43 or 261. Follow Summit Street to the traffic light at Loop Road and turn north towards campus. The WKSU parking lot is the first driveway on the right (off Loop Road and not Summit Street, despite the Summit Street address.). Drive past the first parking area and around the front of the building. Visitor parking spaces are located on the Summit Street side of the building (and no permits are required for station guests).

Driving Directions (At-A-Glance)

From the West

Take I-76 East to the Route 43/Kent exit.

Take Route 43 North (left turn) to the intersection of Route 261.

Turn right onto 261.

Continue through the first traffic light.

At the second traffic light (Summit Street), turn left.

WKSU is located at the next traffic light (intersection of Summit and Loop).

Turn right onto Loop, and make another right into the WKSU parking lot.

From the East

Take I-76 West to the Route 43/Kent exit.

Take Route 43 North (right turn) to the intersection of Route 261.

Turn right onto 261.

Continue through the first traffic light.

At the second traffic light (Summit Street), turn left.

WKSU is located at the next traffic light (intersection of Summit and Loop).

Turn right onto Loop, and make another right into the WKSU parking lot.

From the South

Take I-77 North to I-76 East.

Take I-76 East to the Route 43/Kent exit.

Take Route 43 North (left turn) to the intersection of Route 261.

Turn right onto 261.

Continue through the first traffic light.

At the second traffic light (Summit Street), turn left.

WKSU is located at the next traffic light (intersection of Summit and Loop).

Turn right onto Loop, and make another right into the WKSU parking lot.

From the North

Take 480 South until it ends in Streetsboro and becomes Route 14.

Take Route 14 until it intersects Route 43.

Turn right (South) onto Route 43, and follow it to Kent.

In Kent, turn left onto Route 59 (Main Street).

Follow Route 59 through downtown Kent, toward Kent State University.

Turn right onto Horning Road (just before the church), and veer left.

Turn right onto Loop Road, and follow it through the stop sign at Rhodes Road.

WKSU is on the left, just before the intersection of Loop and Summit Streets.
